entry.content:
Requirements

  1. Parking lot can be a single floor or multi-floor facility.
  2. There are multiple entry/exit points.
  3. Vehicles allowed in the parking lot are 2 wheelers(bicycles, motorcycles etc.) and 4 wheelers(car, bus, truck etc.
  4. Parking lot has parking spots where vehicles are parked.
  5. Parking spots are of fixed sizes. For simplicity, lets assume a car perfectly fits a standard sized parking lot.
  6. We can park multiple vehicles in a single parking spot. For example, two cycles in the same slot.
  7. For bigger vehicles like buses and trucks, multiple consecutive spots can be assigned.
  8. Customers will be assigned a parking ticket at entry and payment has to be done at exit.
  9. The different payment modes are cash, credit/debit cards, UPI etc.
  10. Vehicles should be assigned the nearest available spots to the entry point. 
  11. There can be multiple ways of calculating parking fees. For example, flat $5 per hour for every vehicle, $10 for first 2 hours and $20 for every extra hour above 2 hours.
